perturbation.changed_text:
4.3 Fee Statements and Payments.
(a) Monthly and Quarterly Financial Deliverables. Exact shall on a monthly basis, not later than thirty (30) Business Days after the end of the month, deliver to Pfizer a full suite of performance data, including Product Laboratory Services completed, average selling price per unit, Laboratory Service Revenue, rebates, net revenue and a detailed Cost of Sales schedule
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces a contradiction by extending the deadline for Exact to deliver performance data to Pfizer from fifteen (15) to thirty (30) business days. This creates uncertainty regarding which deadline is applicable, potentially leading to disputes over reporting timelines.

perturbation.changed_text:
The Violating Party shall be liable for damages or remedies as provided by law.
8.4 Termination Without Cause. After the date that is twenty-four (24) months after the Effective Date, either Party may terminate this Agreement upon three (3) months prior written notice to the other Party.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an in-text contradiction by changing the timeline for termination without cause. The original agreement allows either party to terminate after eighteen (18) months with six (6) months' notice, while the modified version only allows it after twenty-four (24) months with three (3) months' notice. This directly conflicts and causes uncertainty about when and how termination without cause can occur.

perturbation.changed_text: 8.7 Royalty Upon Expiration.
